system.availability: Compact light source held in the hand or attached to the bayonet lug of most rifles. Light beam can be adjusted via a focusing dial to cover a wide area or a tighter, longer range illumination. Lasts about 1d5+5 hours before needing recharge.
system.cost:
Part of the Standard Kit of all Guardsmen. Total Weight: ~32kg, Total Cost: 185 Thrones.
HB: Get it all at once acquisition at Scarce Availability
